```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(dplyr)
aed_icon  <- makeIcon(
  iconUrl = "maps/marker.png",
  iconWidth = 30, iconHeight = 30)

aed_sites <- read.csv("maps/aed-sites.csv")
leaflet(data = aed_sites,height=400, width=770) %>% addTiles() %>%
  setView(lng = 0, lat = 0, zoom = 1) %>%
  addMarkers(~Lon, ~Lat, popup = ~Model, icon = aed_icon) 
```
